channel.description: Recent content in cli on Radu Matei's Blog

item.title: Building self-contained, single executable .NET Core 3 CLI tools
item.description: This is the .NET Coreâ€™s first iteration at self-contained binaries. It is not ideal - the resulting size of ~40M is probably way too large for simple applications. But the fact that now we can actually create a global tool with .NET and distribute it without requiring users to install .NET is extremely exciting! Not to mention the ease of packaging applications in containers, and not having to copy tens of files.
